channel.title: Peter Awnsers
channel.description:
I no this post is sorta pointless but is a discussion
anyway i was making this thread to ask you have you been tricked by ure friends/family by peter awnsers
[code]Peter, please answer: What’s "Peter Answers"? Peter simulates to be a "soul" that answers any question given to him.
Our friends will be astonished when "Peter" answers to them what kind of clothes are they wearing, what they are holding in their hands or any personal question they want to ask.
[/code]

How to Use Peter Answers

If you love to play tricks on your friends or family members, lead them to a computer and introduce them to Peter. Have them choose a question, type it in, and Peter will amaze everyone in the room. But you alone know the key to Peter's...
